name: Cubicratic 2.1
description:
Cubicratic is a fast-paced indie puzzle game in which you are a cube traveling through a maze. Avoid the still walls and moving obstacles or fall back to the beginning. When you move right or left using the arrow keys, you stop moving up. The hard part is that you can't go backwards. Developed by Andrew P. (fredfred)

Check us out at www.YouTube.com/fredfredchannel
